vibesExplanation:
This workout embodies 'The Reboot Workout' vibe, as indicated by the focus on gentle stretching suitable for beginners, with phrases like '10 Minute Beginner Full Body Stretch' and comments about feeling more energized and helped by the exercises. The 'Comfort Moves' vibe is also present, scoring 0.7, because the video is geared towards an accessible, feel-good stretching routine, supported by comments from users with disabilities who find the exercises helpful and energizing.

The comments confirm simplicity and effectiveness, aligning with the calming and intentional practice characteristic of a Zen Flow.

Confidence is high due to explicit indications in the title, description, and user feedback about the nature and impact of the workout.
